question: What is the new dead line for filing income tax returns for FY20 by individuals?
explanation:
The Central Government has extended the due dates for filing income tax returns and tax audit reports for FY 20 to various classes of taxpayers.
As per the announcement, individuals who are not required to conduct a tax audit report can file their Income Tax for FY 20 up to 31st December 2020. The original due date of 31 July 2020 was earlier extended to 30 November 2020.
